name: Send them to the sky
description:
Use your magic cell keeping those funny villagers in the sky and don't let them down!

Don't crash your keyboard when you almost break the latest high score but failed!

gameplay

A mouse is enough for this game(but yes, you can also move with W,S,A,D).

Left click to fire the green cell sending villagers to the sky.
Right click to fire the red cell let your villagers experience zero gravity.

score

the score will be increased if people are flying, the more people in the sky the more score you will get during the same time period. Your score will be decreased by percentage If someone falls. Your score will be zero if no one in the sky.
